Control Name: 3.1. Ensure that 'Secure transfer required' is set to 'Enabled'
Control Statement: The secure transfer option enhances the security of a storage account by only allowing HTTPS requests to the storage account by a secure connection. Any requests using HTTP will be rejected when 'secure transfer required' is enabled.
